Class dom.session.SessionViewID 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.id.DObjectID
            |
            +----dom.session.SessionViewID
public class SessionViewID
extends DObjectID
implements java.io.Serializable
A Views's (local View of distributed group) unique identification. Includes a) a unique number for a particular local 'view' of a session; b) An URL, which can be used as an external reference to the session view this id represents (for access to entering/leaving group)

NOTE: This id is opaque, so it could be replaced by, say, a SturdyRef.

Author:
Scott Lewis
See Also:
View

Method Detail

makeNewID

public static SessionViewID makeNewID(java.net.URL theURL) throws java.lang.Exception
Static method to create new instance of SessionViewIDs. This is a factory for making these ids, and the central point for all SessionViewID creation.
Parameters:
theURL - the URL that will be used to point at this view
Returns:
SessionViewID that is new id
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - thrown if some problem making id
